name: Spawn Kings
description: Spawn Kings is a turn-based monster collecting fantasy RPG. Complete quests and eliminate creatures also known as (spawns) to gain various rewards. Collect spawns, armor, and gain experience in order to crown yourself as the king. Using strategy, equipping armor, and leveling your spawns are all essential components for surviving in this mystical world. This is not a complete version of the game but will be updated frequently with new content such as, new spawns, maps, armor, and multiplayer.
